description: Leading development of OMS-related workflows and commerce integrations.
responsibilities: Led development and extension of OMS-related workflows enabling automated transactional communications and improved operational visibility across order processing flows
Worked with OMS integrations supporting order routing and fulfillment flows across Order Management, Fulfillment, PLP, PDP, and Cart modules
Implemented API extensions and service integrations improving data exchange between commerce and OMS services
Designed and deployed the Yard-Rx module, delivering location-based product recommendations leveraging store and inventory context
Built scalable UI and workflow components supporting order summaries, offer handling, and checkout improvements, reducing customer confusion and abandonment
Collaborated with backend and OMS teams to improve handling of returns, cancellations, and order modification flows

description: Developed reusable components and workflows supporting order and account experiences.
responsibilities: Developed reusable components and workflows supporting order and account experiences, improving customer self-service capabilities
Implemented accessibility and interaction improvements across account and checkout experiences
Built scalable UI components including notification systems, store locator flows, and product interaction modules
Enhanced PDP and Cart experiences by optimizing API integration and improving data presentation responsiveness
Supported OMS-driven flows including purchase history, subscriptions, and customer order visibility

description: Migrated legacy modules to React and improved UI components.
responsibilities: Migrated legacy Backbone.js modules to React.js improving maintainability and scalability within KIBO platform
Supported UI modules related to account management, order history, subscriptions, and dynamic notifications
Improved responsiveness and accessibility across core commerce flows including PDP and Cart
Documented reusable components within Storybook for improved cross-team adoption and faster development

description: Built a responsive booking and service discovery platform.
responsibilities: Built a responsive booking and service discovery platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap
Improved user engagement through optimized booking flows and device compatibility improvements
